title: Gragas - Discussion + My Thoughts
body:
I know when Rito reworked Gragas they expected people to set up mad plays with Gragas' Q / R, but after the tremendous nerf affecting his ability to clear wave, I think this is slightly unfair on those who main him. 

I think raising his ultimate to 250 / 400 / 550 but lowering the ratio to somewhere around .55 or .60 would make more sense than it is at the moment, though it has a fairly high ratio, it's useless as most Gragas' rely on rushing Athene, Tear or RoA which all don't give early ability power or presence that Gragas needs.

Another nice buff to Gragas that would at least make him played again, is to either remove the damage reduction on his Q, or for every level the reduction becomes lower, like 70% / 75% / 80% / 85% / 90% or leave it around 85 / 90 to allow him to deal just a tad more damage, also making his Q deal just a bit more damage instead of having to actually wait a few seconds for it to actually do damage late game

Current :
MAGIC DAMAGE: 80 / 120 / 160 / 200 / 240 (+ 60% AP)
MAXIMUM MAGIC DAMAGE: 120 / 180 / 240 / 300 / 360 (+ 90% AP)
SLOW: 30 / 35 / 40 / 45 / 50%
MAXIMUM SLOW: 45 / 52.5 / 60 / 67.5 / 75%
DAMAGE TO MINIONS: 70%

Prefer:
MAGIC DAMAGE: 65 / 115 / 165 / 215 / 265 (+. 65% AP)
MAXIMUM MAGIC DAMAGE: 97.5 / 172.5 / 247.5 / 322.5 / 397.5 (+ 95% AP) [THESE NUMBERS ROUND OFF TO 98 / 173 ETC.]
SLOW: 40% / 42.5% / 45% / 47.5% / 50%
MAXIMUM SLOW: 40 / 45 / 50 / 55 / 60%
DAMAGE TO MINIONS: 70% / 75% / 80% / 85% / 90% OR 85%

This gives Gragas more of an early game pressure like he used to in the form of crowd control, being able to more easily go up with his Body Slam after the slow from Barrel Roll, his damage late game is much stronger while is crowd control is mainly from Body Slam since Barrel Roll is just a minor nuisance to some champs.
It will also reward Gragas for maxing his Q instead of his W [in the top lane] or his E in most situations.

Though this isn't a huge buff it still does Gragas more justice, when Riot was thinking of maxing Gragas more combo'e, it actually hurt him greatly.
They knew his incredible wave clear was what made his one of the exceptions, but I haven't seen anyone try it with the new Gragas because:
1. Players in the high tier know the potential dangers of Gragas and stay too far away from his ultimate, only ever allowing him to ult in teamfights which might be a bad or great idea.
2. Players in lower tier, either ult them to the wrong place and never get them inside the barrel either being too far away from the barrel, or simply just right next to it but not in the AoE.

For his ultimate I think they could add the a huge circle around Gragas' ult to show how far they are going to be knocked back, like Vayne's E.
It would also be a nice to do it to Tristana and Lee Sin, showing how far the target is going to be knocked back.
I'm not sure if Gragas' ult makes them knock just around the radius of his ultimate or beyond that, if they are further away but they should do something so that people getting to know Gragas know where they are going to land, I'm not sure how it'd work since they get knocked back depending on how far they are ( I think ).

Current:
MAGIC DAMAGE: 200 / 300 / 400 (+ 70% AP)

Prefer:
MAGIC DAMAGE: 250 / 400 / 550 (+ 55% AP) OR MAGIC DAMAGE: 200 / 275 / 350 (+ 80% AP) OR 250 / 375 / 500 (+ 60% AP)

I'm really just coming up with a lot of numbers for Gragas and I think the last one works the best, it gives him more early game damage if he's rushing sustain rather than pure ability power, and just raw power if his going tank, bruiser or Lady Gragas in the Jangle.

I know if Riot did this, there would be a lot of nerfs to his W and E to compensate, but I think these fairly small changes don't really need any changing to compensate, except maybe making his E 50 / 100 / 150 / 200 / 250 and his W have no base damage, just % but with a 45% AP Ratio from 30%.

I really, really don't know but that's why I'm making a discussion, please tell me what you think below. Also please keep it friendly, no arguments, just debating and seeing what works else best. Hope a Rito member comments **IF** this gets popular.

replies.body:
I'm not from the game balance / clarity parts of Riot - or anywhere related to that, so this post is only my own personal feelings as a player! 

As a pretty heavy support player, I wonder if raw-damage based changes like that would actually make Support-Gragas pretty strong, especially building a tanky-ish build with Haunting Guise. This could be a good thing, but something to consider! 

I like the idea of the secondary large circle to show the knockback, but I could see it also being confusing to new players, expecting that that second AoE would also be taking damage.
